name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.job.committer.cancel-timeout
description:
The amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the output
    committer to cancel an operation if the job is killed

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.size
description: Size of the EncryptedKeyVersion cache Queue for each key

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-single-resource-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) of a single resource a map reduce job
    is allow to submit for localization via files, libjars, archives, and
    jobjar command line arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to
    0 the limit is ignored.

name: dfs.client.mmap.cache.timeout.ms
description:
The minimum length of time that we will keep an mmap entry in the cache
    between uses.  If an entry is in the cache longer than this, and nobody
    uses it, it will be removed by a background thread.

name: dfs.mover.max-no-move-interval
description:
If this specified amount of time has elapsed and no block has been moved
    out of a source DataNode, on more effort will be made to move blocks out of
    this DataNode in the current Mover iteration.

name: ipc.[port_number].weighted-cost.lockfree
description:
The weight multiplier to apply to the time spent in the
    LOCKFREE phase which do not involve holding a lock.
    See org.apache.hadoop.ipc.ProcessingDetails.Timing for more details on
    this phase. This property applies to WeightedTimeCostProvider.

name: dfs.namenode.heartbeat.recheck-interval
description:
This time decides the interval to check for expired datanodes.
    With this value and dfs.heartbeat.interval, the interval of
    deciding the datanode is stale or not is also calculated.
    The unit of this configuration is millisecond.
